text: Di kaphe teuma lam apui mirah Apur nuraka teumpat sÄ± Kapne Di donya sabe seunang that di kah Raseuki di kah lam udep donya Abeh dum phana keu udep mewah Jinoe karasa azeub that hina Uroe nyoe teuma nyan keuh beunalah Teukabo that kah dilee lam bumoe Hana meusidroe nyang sabe ngon kah Di kah teukabo kon ateuh beuna Bandum kah teuma fased that leupah
